string-param.helpText: The IT Resource used to establish the connection to the Service Provider
The name of the object to reconcile
The operation to perform on the object to reconcile. Has to be either Refresh or Update
The name of the entity attribute that has to be stored as the encoded value
The name of the entity attribute that has to be stored as the decoded value
Holds the timestamp when this task was last executed successfully
The value written to Lookup Group in case the operation on a particular Lookup Definition has to create it
The identifier of the source (aka ObjectClass) that has to be used to reconcile

boolean-param.helpText: Select the option Yes if the entitlements loaded needs to be prefixed with the internal system identifier and/or the name of the IT Resource
Select this option if the data should only be gathered from the reconciliation source

number-param.helpText: Specifies the size of a batch read from the reconciliation source

string-param.helpText: Specifies the name of the Job that will be started by this Job on successfully completion
The IT Resource used to establish the connection to the Service Provider
The name of the object to reconcile
The path to the descriptor which specifies the mapping between the incomming field names and the reconciliation fields of the object to reconcile
Holds the timestamp when this task was last executed successfully
Specifies which filter criteria has to be applied to retrieve entries. Must be a valid Service Provider search filter

number-param.helpText: Specifies the size of a batch read from the Service Provider

string-param.helpText: Specifies the name of the Job that will be started by this Job on successfully completion
The IT Resource used to establish the connection to the Service Provider
The name of the object to reconcile
The path to the descriptor which specifies the mapping between the incomming field names and the reconciliation fields of the object to reconcile
Holds the timestamp when this task was last executed successfully

boolean-param.helpText: Select the option Yes if the Service Provider search has to be extended by the timestamp this job was last time executed successfully as a filter criteria; otherwise select option No
Select the option Yes to prevent event creation and processing of Service Provider data that already exists in Identity Manager; otherwise select option No
Select this option if the data should only be gathered from the reconciliation source

string-param.helpText: Specifies which filter criteria has to be applied to retrieve entries. Must be a valid Service Provider search filter

number-param.helpText: Specifies the size of a batch read from the Service Provider
Specifies that how many threads this task should create to distribute the workload

string-param.helpText: Specifies the name of the Job that will be started by this Job on successfully completion
